oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wie beurteilen Landwirtschaftsschüler die Zukunft des Ökolandbaus?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ferjani, Ali
Mann, Stefan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A written standardized survey was conducted among 400 agricultural student in 9 Agricultural Swiss colleges in 2009 to investigate the attitudes, intentions and opinions towards organic farming. The result: Sympathies are against brought to the bio agriculture, but concerning the conversion there are still many reservations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Ferjani, Ali and Mann, Stefan (2011) Wie beurteilen Landwirtschaftsschüler die Zukunft des Ökolandbaus? Poster at: 11. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Gießen, 15.-18. März 2011.
